decision_conditions: The proposed alteration of roof from hip to gable end and installation of 3no. rooflights to rear roofslope and 2no. rooflights to front roofslope falls within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
Please provide Proposed Sections at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire property not just part and showing dimensions.
